**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 243 2.0 You know a great deal about ancient philosophies, esoteric lore, obscure mysticism, and supernatural creatures. Occultism Untrained General Actions - [Recall Knowledge](/Skills.aspx?ID=24&General=true) about ancient mysteries; obscure philosophies; creatures of occult significance (like [aberrations](/Traits.aspx?ID=523), [spirits](/Traits.aspx?ID=149), and [oozes](/Traits.aspx?ID=665)); and esoteric planes like the [Astral Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=8), [Creation's Forge](/Planes.aspx?ID=27), the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=9), [the Netherworld](/Planes.aspx?ID=36), and [the Void](/Planes.aspx?ID=28). Occultism Trained General Actions - [Decipher Writing](/Skills.aspx?ID=20&General=true) on occult topics, including complex metaphysical systems, syncretic principles, obscure philosophies, and incoherent ramblings. - [Identify Magic](/Skills.aspx?ID=22&General=true), particularly magic of the [occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) tradition. - [Learn a Spell](/Skills.aspx?ID=23&General=true) from the [occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) tradition. Item Bonuses for Occultism
Item Bonus Level Category Consumable Note
[Cognitive Mutagen (Lesser)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3316) +1 1 [Alchemical Elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) Yes
[Herald's Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3633) +2 13 [Held Items](/equipment/held-items) No When worn with the black velvet lining facing out, the _stage magician’s cloak_ grants a +2 item bonus to Occultism checks.
[Cognitive Mutagen (Moderate)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3316) +3 3 [Alchemical Elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) Yes
[Cognitive Mutagen (Greater)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3316) +3 11 [Alchemical Elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) Yes
[Cognitive Mutagen (Major)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3316) +4 17 [Alchemical Elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) Yes
Related Feats To see a list of Feats related to Occultism, [click here](/feats?include-traits=skill&exclude-traits=archetype&include-skills=occultism&sort=level-asc%3Bname-asc).
